chunked_vad.lyrics_text: "Nobody In His Right Mind Would've Left Her" That was her favorite song She sang along every time it came on First time we danced was to Marina Del Rey
That was her favorite song She sang along every time it came on First time we danced was to Marina Del Rey And I fell right there and then
She sang along every time it came on First time we danced was to Marina Del Rey And I fell right there and then I didn't want that song to end
First time we danced was to Marina Del Rey And I fell right there and then I didn't want that song to end Baby blue was the color of her eyes
And I fell right there and then I didn't want that song to end Baby blue was the color of her eyes I can still see them in my mind
I didn't want that song to end Baby blue was the color of her eyes I can still see them in my mind Probably will for the rest of my life
Baby blue was the color of her eyes I can still see them in my mind Probably will for the rest of my life Damn Strait, you're killing me man
I can still see them in my mind Probably will for the rest of my life Damn Strait, you're killing me man You know I've always been your biggest fan
Probably will for the rest of my life Damn Strait, you're killing me man You know I've always been your biggest fan Now I can't even listen
